div.p: I get an exception saying No suitable driver when initialising the JDBC driver.

ActiveMQ tries to auto-detect the JDBC driver so that it can deduce the ultimate database's SQL dialect. Some JDBC drivers are not yet auto-recognised. Here's how to configure the language adapater class to use or to provide us with details of your driver so we can add support for it to ActiveMQ.
